name: EndogenAI A2A Server
description: A2A task orchestration server for the EndogenAI agent coordination layer. Aligned with A2A specification v0.3.0.

skills.name: Send Task
skills.description: Submit a new task with an optional initial message.

skills.name: Get Task
skills.description: Retrieve a task and its full message history by ID.

skills.name: Add Message
skills.description: Append a message to an active task's history.
